relation: Hostname of the Oracle WebLogic Server (for example, myhost).
Port of the Oracle WebLogic Server (for example, 7001).
User name for connecting to the running server to get MBean information (for example, weblogic).
textBeforeTable: Table 41-26 ant SOA Infrastructure Partitioning List Commands Table 41-26 describes the syntax. Note: After specifying the user name, enter the password when prompted. ant -f ant-sca-mgmt.xml listPartitions -Dhost=host -Dport=port -Duser=user  Example 41-31 Listing All Available Partitions in the SOA Infrastructure  Example 41-31 provides the syntax for listing all available partitions in the SOA Infrastructure. 41.7.5.2.17 Listing All Available Partitions in the SOA Infrastructure           Password for the user name.   password     User name for connecting to the running server to get MBean information (for example, weblogic).   user     Port of the Oracle WebLogic Server (for example, 7001).   port     Hostname of the Oracle WebLogic Server (for example, myhost).   host      Definition Argument   Table 41-25 ant SOA Composite Application Deployment List Commands  Table 41-25
textAfterTable: Example 41-32 provides an example of listing all available partitions in the SOA Infrastructure. Example 41-32 Listing All Available Partitions in the SOA Infrastructure  ant -f ant-sca-mgmt.xml listPartitions -Dhost=stabc10 -Dport=8001 41.7.5.2.18 Listing All Composites in a Partition Example 41-33 provides the syntax for listing all composites in a partition. Example 41-33 Listing All Composites in a Partition  ant -f ant-sca-mgmt.xml listCompositesInPartition -Dhost=host -Dport=port -Duser=user -Dpartition=partition.name Note: After specifying the user name, enter the password when prompted. Table 41-27 describes the syntax. Table 41-27 ant Composite Partitioning List Commands Argument Definition host Hostname of the Oracle WebLogic Server (for example, myhost). port Port of the Oracle WebLogic Server (for example, 7001). user User name for connecting to the running server to get MBean information (for example, weblogic).
